column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////First time here! I love ramen and always up to try new places. There was quite to choose from so I ask the server which is the most popular. She recommended the jinya no 1 tonkotsu black..I think that's what it's called. Broth full of flavor. My fianc√© ordered the chicken ramen and didn't like it as much as mine. Would def come back for more
